reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater gorgeous and very soft. They appreciate its warmth, with one customer noting it's perfect for cold climate winter wear.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, runs slightly large
items.body: Gorgeous, soft very thick great for winter but a bit too warm for fall. I usually wear size small in US sizes... I got the XS and it fits perfectly. Read more
items.author: A.R.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great deal on a gorgeous sweater!
items.body: Beautiful sweater, very soft. Deep green color exactly as pictured. I am 5'4'', 142 lbs. I am short waisted and the medium fit me perfectly without having to roll the bottom under. Great value for a Vince sweater! Read more
items.author: MnShoeGirl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fashionable clothing
items.body: Perfect sweater for any occasion! Wear with skirts, Jeans or evening wear! So soft and cozy! Read more
items.author: Joan Auerbach

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vince is my favorite. Beautiful!
items.body: I love this sweater. I have owned Vince for years...and still wear my first purchases with pride. Well worth the extra cost as the clothing lasts forever. Sizes vary, I have found. I typically buy sweaters at least one size up for that extra comfortable feeling. Read more
items.author: Lydia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lush cashmere
items.body: Beautiful luxurious cashmere sweater ..perfect for my cold climate winter wear .. not fitted and hangs nicely with slacks or skirt..sumptuously soft ! . Read more
items.author: Syd

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, soft and warm
items.body: I love this sweater. It was not in the shape it should have been when it arrived - half inside out and stuffed into a plastic bag. Seems to be okay though. I love it. Read more
items.author: V. Noodle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable & classy
items.body: One of the best style sweaters out there. The funnel neck top is gorgeous and classy. I love the feel of the cashmere. These have lasted me multiple winters. Read more
items.author: uaf_nook

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous Sweater but…
items.body: This is a beautiful sweater. It’s very soft, thick cashmere in this bluish green color is amazing. However, it was delivered to me with electronic security tag still on it! I have no idea how to get this off without going to a store that may have the right device to get the tag off. Beautiful sweater but comes with a temporary hassle. Read more
items.author: Ilikevalue&quality

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Azurine, Amalfi, H Charcoal, Truffle, H Vintage Rose, Heather Platinum, Dewberry, Black, Camel, H Aqua Gem, Cacao, Wave Quartz, White Sand, Off-white. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
